conbody.section:
The formatting of number, amount and date is managed using their Display Format. The Display Formats available by default in Design Studio are the display formats delivered with Triple'A Plus as standard.
The following table shows a Display Format example for the decimal number 12345.12345 with standard packaging:
Display format Runtime display
decimal 12345.12
decimal.detailed 12345.1234
decimal.6-digits 12345.123450
The following table shows a Display Format example for the date 14th May 2009 with standard packaging:
Display format Runtime display
date 14 May 2009
date.edit 14.05.2009
date.month-year May 2009

section.title: Technical
section.p: The runtime rendering of the Display Format is managed by the file HumanPatterns.properties defined in the WUI-block WUI-UNPROFILED.
If you need to update the Display Formats available in Design Studio with customized ones, see section Update Display Format.
